attributes.action: domestic violence no more new offence creating
attributes.additional_details: What I see that Ministers are breaking human right law of marriage. its not right for ministers to control peoples marriage and interfering of their relationship. Its against Human law right. Domestic Abuse is for both for women and man, I wish the Ministers to reconsider not to make a new law, it will effect people relationship and life and it will also destroy peoples marriage that vows. I hope Ministry of Justice to support for both parties to a man and women to as equal. More bad law, it will effect peoples life and living of the society.
